basic.description: This course examines several environmental topics, and the relevant background chemistry. The chemistry includes black body radiation, the second law of thermodynamics, Gibbs energy and equilibrium, fuels, acid-base chemistry, and gas phase kinetics. Environmental topics include ozone depletion, acid rain, air quality, global warming and the environmental impact of various energy conversion processes.
basic.subject: APSC
basic.title: Chemistry And The Environment
